verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm <WH4210> or Song <WH7892> of David <WH1732>. Let 'Elohim <WH430> arise <WH6965> <WH8799>, let his enemies <WH341> <WH8802> be scattered <WH6327> <WH8799>: let them also that hate <WH8130> <WH8764> him flee <WH5127> <WH8799> before <WH6440> him.

As smoke <WH6227> is driven away <WH5086> <WH8736>, so drive them away <WH5086> <WH8799>: as wax <WH1749> melteth <WH4549> <WH8736> before <WH6440> the fire <WH784>, so let the wicked <WH7563> perish <WH6> <WH8799> at the presence <WH6440> of 'Elohim <WH430>.
But let the righteous <WH6662> be glad <WH8055> <WH8799>; let them rejoice <WH5970> <WH8799> before <WH6440> 'Elohim <WH430>: yea, let them exceedingly <WH8057> rejoice <WH7797> <WH8799>.

Sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto 'Elohim <WH430>, sing praises <WH2167> <WH8761> to his name <WH8034>: extol <WH5549> <WH8798> him that rideth <WH7392> <WH8802> upon the heavens <WH6160> by his name <WH8034> YAH <WH3050>, and rejoice <WH5937> <WH8798> before <WH6440> him.
A father <WH1> of the fatherless <WH3490>, and a judge <WH1781> of the widows <WH490>, is 'Elohim <WH430> in his holy <WH6944> habitation <WH4583>.

'Elohim <WH430> setteth <WH3427> <WH8688> the solitary <WH3173> in families <WH1004>: he bringeth out <WH3318> <WH8688> those which are bound <WH615> with chains <WH3574>: but the rebellious <WH5637> <WH8802> dwell <WH7931> <WH8804> in a dry <WH6707> land.
O 'Elohim <WH430>, when thou wentest forth <WH3318> <WH8800> before <WH6440> thy people <WH5971>, when thou didst march <WH6805> <WH8800> through the wilderness <WH3452>; Selah <WH5542>:

The earth <WH776> shook <WH7493> <WH8804>, the heavens <WH8064> also dropped <WH5197> <WH8804> at the presence <WH6440> of 'Elohim <WH430>: even Sinai <WH5514> itself <WH2088> was moved at the presence <WH6440> of 'Elohim <WH430>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
Thou, O 'Elohim <WH430>, didst send <WH5130> <WH8686> a plentiful <WH5071> rain <WH1653>, whereby thou didst confirm <WH3559> <WH8790> thine inheritance <WH5159>, when it was weary <WH3811> <WH8738>.
Thy congregation <WH2416> hath dwelt <WH3427> <WH8804> therein: thou, O 'Elohim <WH430>, hast prepared <WH3559> <WH8686> of thy goodness <WH2896> for the poor <WH6041>.
The YY <WH136> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> the word <WH562>: great <WH7227> was the company <WH6635> of those that published <WH1319> <WH8764> it.
Kings <WH4428> of armies <WH6635> did flee <WH5074> <WH8799> apace <WH5074> <WH8799>: and she that tarried <WH5116> at home <WH1004> divided <WH2505> <WH8762> the spoil <WH7998>.

Though ye have lien <WH7901> <WH8799> among the pots <WH8240>, yet shall ye be as the wings <WH3671> of a dove <WH3123> covered <WH2645> <WH8737> with silver <WH3701>, and her feathers <WH84> with yellow <WH3422> gold <WH2742>.
When 'El SHaddai <WH7706> scattered <WH6566> <WH8763> kings <WH4428> in it, it was white as snow <WH7949> <WH8686> in Salmon <WH6756>.
The hill <WH2022> of 'Elohim <WH430> is as the hill <WH2022> of Bashan <WH1316>; an high <WH1386> hill <WH2022> as the hill <WH2022> of Bashan <WH1316>.

Why leap <WH7520> <WH8762> ye, ye high <WH1386> hills <WH2022>? this is the hill <WH2022> which 'Elohim <WH430> desireth <WH2530> <WH8804> to dwell in <WH3427> <WH8800>; yea, the YY <WH3068> will dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> in it for ever <WH5331>.
The chariots <WH7393> of 'Elohim <WH430> are twenty thousand <WH7239>, even thousands <WH505> of angels <WH8136>: the YY <WH136> is among them, as in Sinai <WH5514>, in the holy <WH6944> place.

Thou hast ascended <WH5927> <WH8804> on high <WH4791>, thou hast led captivity <WH7628> captive <WH7617> <WH8804>: thou hast received <WH3947> <WH8804> gifts <WH4979> for men <WH120>; yea, for the rebellious <WH5637> <WH8802> also, that the YY <WH3050> 'Elohim <WH430> might dwell <WH7931> <WH8800> among them.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH136>, who daily <WH3117> <WH3117> loadeth <WH6006> <WH8799> us with benefits, even the 'Elohim <WH410> of our salvation <WH3444>. Selah <WH5542>.
He that is our 'Elohim <WH410> is the 'Elohim <WH410> of salvation <WH4190>; and unto GOD <WH3069> the YY <WH136> belong the issues <WH8444> from death <WH4194>.

But 'Elohim <WH430> shall wound <WH4272> <WH8799> the head <WH7218> of his enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, and the hairy <WH8181> scalp <WH6936> of such an one as goeth on still <WH1980> <WH8693> in his trespasses <WH817>.
The YY <WH136> said <WH559> <WH8804>, I will bring again <WH7725> <WH8686> from Bashan <WH1316>, I will bring my people again <WH7725> <WH8686> from the depths <WH4688> of the sea <WH3220>:
That thy foot <WH7272> may be dipped <WH4272> <WH8799> in the blood <WH1818> of thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, and the tongue <WH3956> of thy dogs <WH3611> in the same.
They have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> thy goings <WH1979>, O 'Elohim <WH430>; even the goings <WH1979> of my 'Elohim <WH410>, my King <WH4428>, in the sanctuary <WH6944>.

The singers <WH7891> <WH8802> went before <WH6923> <WH8765>, the players on instruments <WH5059> <WH8802> followed after <WH310>; among <WH8432> them were the damsels <WH5959> playing with timbrels <WH8608> <WH8802>.
Bless <WH1288> <WH8761> ye 'Elohim <WH430> in the congregations <WH4721>, even the YY <WH136>, from the fountain <WH4726> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

There is little <WH6810> Binyamin <WH1144> with their ruler <WH7287> <WH8802>, the princes <WH8269> of Y'hudah <WH3063> and their council <WH7277>, the princes <WH8269> of Z'vulun <WH2074>, and the princes <WH8269> of Naftali <WH5321>.
Thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thy strength <WH5797>: strengthen <WH5810> <WH8798>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, that which <WH2098> thou hast wrought <WH6466> <WH8804> for us.
Because of thy temple <WH1964> at Yerushalayim <WH3389> shall kings <WH4428> bring <WH2986> <WH8686> presents <WH7862> unto thee.

Rebuke <WH1605> <WH8798> the company <WH2416> of spearmen <WH7070>, the multitude <WH5712> of the bulls <WH47>, with the calves <WH5695> of the people <WH5971>, till every one submit <WH7511> <WH8693> himself with pieces <WH7518> of silver <WH3701>: scatter <WH967> <WH8765> thou the people <WH5971> that delight <WH2654> <WH8799> in war <WH7128>.
Princes <WH2831> shall come out <WH857> <WH8799> of Egypt <WH4714>; Ethiopia <WH3568> shall soon stretch out <WH7323> <WH8686> her hands <WH3027> unto 'Elohim <WH430>.
Sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto 'Elohim <WH430>, ye kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776>; O sing praises <WH2167> <WH8761> unto the YY <WH136>; Selah <WH5542>:

To him that rideth <WH7392> <WH8802> upon the heavens <WH8064> of heavens <WH8064>, which were of old <WH6924>; lo, he doth send out <WH5414> <WH8799> his voice <WH6963>, and that a mighty <WH5797> voice <WH6963>.
Ascribe <WH5414> <WH8798> ye strength <WH5797> unto 'Elohim <WH430>: his excellency <WH1346> is over Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and his strength <WH5797> is in the clouds <WH7834>.

O 'Elohim <WH430>, thou art terrible <WH3372> <WH8737> out of thy holy places <WH4720>: the 'Elohim <WH410> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> is he that giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> strength <WH5797> and power <WH8592> unto his people <WH5971>. Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be 'Elohim <WH430>.
